snippet: Gerald Brooks, 39, who was originally arrested in October for violating an order of protection, was the last in a string of five people who have escaped from police custody beginning in June.
abstract: New York City police report apprehension of Gerald Brooks, who escaped from police custody in October; Brooks's escape prompted Police Commissioner William J Bratton to publicly rebuke the officers involved.
lead_paragraph: Gerald Brooks, 39, who was originally arrested in October for violating an order of protection, was the last in a string of five people who have escaped from police custody beginning in June.

headline.main: Suspect Who Escaped From Police Custody Is Arrested in Queens
headline.print_headline: Man Caught After Escape From Police in October
